amendment.description: Amendment adds to the findings in Section 2 highlighting the State Department's scientific and environmental findings which conclude that the Keystone XL pipeline is a safe and environmentally sound project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-88 to add to the findings in Section 2 highlighting the State Department's scientific and environmental findings which conclude that the Keystone XL pipeline is a safe and environmentally sound project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weber (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 168 (Roll no. 169).
